meanings.definition: The quality or state of being base or low in character or quality.
meanings.sent1: His basenesses were evident in his dishonest actions.
meanings.sent2: The basenesses of his behavior shocked everyone.
meanings.sent3: Despite his basenesses, he tried to appear honorable.
meanings.sent4: The basenesses of his soul were like a dark cloud over him.
meanings.sent5: The basenesses of his character tainted everything he did.

meanings.definition: Actions or behaviors that are morally reprehensible or dishonorable.
meanings.sent1: She was disgusted by the basenesses of his lies.
meanings.sent2: The community condemned the basenesses of the crime.
meanings.sent3: His basenesses were so extreme, they became a joke among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The basenesses of his actions stained his reputation forever.
meanings.sent5: The basenesses of his behavior left a lasting impact on those around him.
